body_html:
I do not have an issue with the CMake part. However, when I type make I got the following:

davood@davood:/mnist/build$ cmake -DCMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=/mnist/libtorch
-- The C compiler identification is GNU 7.3.0
-- The CXX compiler identification is GNU 7.3.0
-- Check for working C compiler: /usr/bin/cc
-- Check for working C compiler: /usr/bin/cc -- works
-- Detecting C compiler ABI info
-- Detecting C compiler ABI info - done
-- Detecting C compile features
-- Detecting C compile features - done
-- Check for working CXX compiler: /usr/bin/c++
-- Check for working CXX compiler: /usr/bin/c++ -- works
-- Detecting CXX compiler ABI info
-- Detecting CXX compiler ABI info - done
-- Detecting CXX compile features
-- Detecting CXX compile features - done
-- Looking for pthread.h
-- Looking for pthread.h - found
-- Looking for pthread_create
-- Looking for pthread_create - not found
-- Looking for pthread_create in pthreads
-- Looking for pthread_create in pthreads - not found
-- Looking for pthread_create in pthread
-- Looking for pthread_create in pthread - found
-- Found Threads: TRUE
-- Downloading MNIST dataset
Downloading http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/train-images-idx3-ubyte.gz ...
0% |################################################################| 100%
Unzipped /home/davood/mnist/build/data/train-images-idx3-ubyte.gz ...
Downloading http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/train-labels-idx1-ubyte.gz ...
0% |################################################################| 100%
Unzipped /home/davood/mnist/build/data/train-labels-idx1-ubyte.gz ...
Downloading http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/t10k-images-idx3-ubyte.gz ...
0% |################################################################| 100%
Unzipped /home/davood/mnist/build/data/t10k-images-idx3-ubyte.gz ...
Downloading http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/t10k-labels-idx1-ubyte.gz ...
0% |################################################################| 100%
Unzipped /home/davood/mnist/build/data/t10k-labels-idx1-ubyte.gz ...
-- Configuring done
-- Generating done
-- Build files have been written to: /home/davood/mnist/build
davood@davood:~/mnist/build$ make
Scanning dependencies of target mnist
[ 50%] Building CXX object CMakeFiles/mnist.dir/mnist.cpp.o
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:106:34: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
struct Normalize : public torch::data::transforms::TensorTransform<> {
^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:106:52: error: expected ‘{’ before ‘TensorTransform’
struct Normalize : public torch::data::transforms::TensorTransform<> {
^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:106:67: error: expected initializer before ‘<’ token
struct Normalize : public torch::data::transforms::TensorTransform<> {
^
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp: In function ‘int main(int, const char**)’:
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:133:14: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
torch::data::datasets::MNIST(
^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:134:37: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
options.data_root, torch::data::datasets::MNIST::Mode::kTrain)
^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:135:40: error: invalid use of incomplete type ‘struct Normalize’
.map(Normalize(0.1307, 0.3081))
^
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:106:8: note: forward declaration of ‘struct Normalize’
struct Normalize : public torch::data::transforms::TensorTransform<> {
^~~~~~~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:136:23: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
.map(torch::data::transforms::TensorLambda<>(
^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:136:54: error: expected primary-expression before ‘>’ token
.map(torch::data::transforms::TensorLambda<>(
^
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:138:23: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
.map(torch::data::transforms::Stack<>());
^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:138:47: error: expected primary-expression before ‘>’ token
.map(torch::data::transforms::Stack<>());
^
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:138:49: error: expected primary-expression before ‘)’ token
.map(torch::data::transforms::Stack<>());
^
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:141:30: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
auto train_loader = torch::data::make_data_loader(
^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:144:29: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
auto test_loader = torch::data::make_data_loader(
^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:145:14: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
torch::data::datasets::MNIST(
^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:146:37: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
options.data_root, torch::data::datasets::MNIST::Mode::kTest)
^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:147:40: error: invalid use of incomplete type ‘struct Normalize’
.map(Normalize(0.1307, 0.3081))
^
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:106:8: note: forward declaration of ‘struct Normalize’
struct Normalize : public torch::data::transforms::TensorTransform<> {
^~~~~~~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:148:23: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
.map(torch::data::transforms::TensorLambda<>(
^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:148:54: error: expected primary-expression before ‘>’ token
.map(torch::data::transforms::TensorLambda<>(
^
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:150:23: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
.map(torch::data::transforms::Stack<>()),
^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:150:47: error: expected primary-expression before ‘>’ token
.map(torch::data::transforms::Stack<>()),
^
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:150:49: error: expected primary-expression before ‘)’ token
.map(torch::data::transforms::Stack<>()),
^
CMakeFiles/mnist.dir/build.make:62: recipe for target 'CMakeFiles/mnist.dir/mnist.cpp.o' failed
make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/mnist.dir/mnist.cpp.o] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:67: recipe for target 'CMakeFiles/mnist.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/mnist.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:83: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2

body:
I do not have an issue with the CMake part. However, when I type make I got the following:

davood@davood:~/mnist/build$ cmake -DCMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=~/mnist/libtorch
-- The C compiler identification is GNU 7.3.0
-- The CXX compiler identification is GNU 7.3.0
-- Check for working C compiler: /usr/bin/cc
-- Check for working C compiler: /usr/bin/cc -- works
-- Detecting C compiler ABI info
-- Detecting C compiler ABI info - done
-- Detecting C compile features
-- Detecting C compile features - done
-- Check for working CXX compiler: /usr/bin/c++
-- Check for working CXX compiler: /usr/bin/c++ -- works
-- Detecting CXX compiler ABI info
-- Detecting CXX compiler ABI info - done
-- Detecting CXX compile features
-- Detecting CXX compile features - done
-- Looking for pthread.h
-- Looking for pthread.h - found
-- Looking for pthread_create
-- Looking for pthread_create - not found
-- Looking for pthread_create in pthreads
-- Looking for pthread_create in pthreads - not found
-- Looking for pthread_create in pthread
-- Looking for pthread_create in pthread - found
-- Found Threads: TRUE  
-- Downloading MNIST dataset
Downloading http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/train-images-idx3-ubyte.gz ...
0% |################################################################| 100%
Unzipped /home/davood/mnist/build/data/train-images-idx3-ubyte.gz ...
Downloading http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/train-labels-idx1-ubyte.gz ...
0% |################################################################| 100%
Unzipped /home/davood/mnist/build/data/train-labels-idx1-ubyte.gz ...
Downloading http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/t10k-images-idx3-ubyte.gz ...
0% |################################################################| 100%
Unzipped /home/davood/mnist/build/data/t10k-images-idx3-ubyte.gz ...
Downloading http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/t10k-labels-idx1-ubyte.gz ...
0% |################################################################| 100%
Unzipped /home/davood/mnist/build/data/t10k-labels-idx1-ubyte.gz ...
-- Configuring done
-- Generating done
-- Build files have been written to: /home/davood/mnist/build
davood@davood:~/mnist/build$ make
Scanning dependencies of target mnist
[ 50%] Building CXX object CMakeFiles/mnist.dir/mnist.cpp.o
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:106:34: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
 struct Normalize : public torch::data::transforms::TensorTransform<> {
                                  ^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:106:52: error: expected ‘{’ before ‘TensorTransform’
 struct Normalize : public torch::data::transforms::TensorTransform<> {
                                                    ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:106:67: error: expected initializer before ‘<’ token
 struct Normalize : public torch::data::transforms::TensorTransform<> {
                                                                   ^
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp: In function ‘int main(int, const char**)’:
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:133:14: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
       torch::data::datasets::MNIST(
              ^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:134:37: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
           options.data_root, torch::data::datasets::MNIST::Mode::kTrain)
                                     ^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:135:40: error: invalid use of incomplete type ‘struct Normalize’
           .map(Normalize(0.1307, 0.3081))
                                        ^
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:106:8: note: forward declaration of ‘struct Normalize’
 struct Normalize : public torch::data::transforms::TensorTransform<> {
        ^~~~~~~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:136:23: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
           .map(torch::data::transforms::TensorLambda<>(
                       ^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:136:54: error: expected primary-expression before ‘>’ token
           .map(torch::data::transforms::TensorLambda<>(
                                                      ^
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:138:23: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
           .map(torch::data::transforms::Stack<>());
                       ^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:138:47: error: expected primary-expression before ‘>’ token
           .map(torch::data::transforms::Stack<>());
                                               ^
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:138:49: error: expected primary-expression before ‘)’ token
           .map(torch::data::transforms::Stack<>());
                                                 ^
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:141:30: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
   auto train_loader = torch::data::make_data_loader(
                              ^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:144:29: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
   auto test_loader = torch::data::make_data_loader(
                             ^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:145:14: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
       torch::data::datasets::MNIST(
              ^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:146:37: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
           options.data_root, torch::data::datasets::MNIST::Mode::kTest)
                                     ^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:147:40: error: invalid use of incomplete type ‘struct Normalize’
           .map(Normalize(0.1307, 0.3081))
                                        ^
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:106:8: note: forward declaration of ‘struct Normalize’
 struct Normalize : public torch::data::transforms::TensorTransform<> {
        ^~~~~~~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:148:23: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
           .map(torch::data::transforms::TensorLambda<>(
                       ^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:148:54: error: expected primary-expression before ‘>’ token
           .map(torch::data::transforms::TensorLambda<>(
                                                      ^
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:150:23: error: ‘torch::data’ has not been declared
           .map(torch::data::transforms::Stack<>()),
                       ^~~~
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:150:47: error: expected primary-expression before ‘>’ token
           .map(torch::data::transforms::Stack<>()),
                                               ^
/home/davood/mnist/build/mnist.cpp:150:49: error: expected primary-expression before ‘)’ token
           .map(torch::data::transforms::Stack<>()),
                                                 ^
CMakeFiles/mnist.dir/build.make:62: recipe for target 'CMakeFiles/mnist.dir/mnist.cpp.o' failed
make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/mnist.dir/mnist.cpp.o] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:67: recipe for target 'CMakeFiles/mnist.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/mnist.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:83: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2
